title: Champion rework/update question.
body:
Hi everyone, hi Rito! There is a fwe questions i'm asking myself.
1- Is your champion rework/update list long?
2- How come Tristana got "buffed" when urgot can barely teamfight?
I know i'm bad at this game, but let's look at the facts, even a bad player like me can see urgot is not that good. All i can do with him is cutom 1v1 a Lee Sin. 
Yeah i know my post sound like whining, but please answer me. I want to improve if i'm the problem.

Noticed this after receiving the Giant Enemy Crabgot freely from Riot (wich is highly appreciated by the way)

replies.body:
The reason is that Tristana just needed a rework for one spell and some numbers tuning whereas Urgot needs a whole new lore / theme (same as Sion), all spells reworked (apart from maybe one or two) and on top of that a visual rework (for Trist it's more of an update).

Even if it is totally random numbers, Urgot is easily 10 times harder to rework than Trist.
